weaponExplanationCN: 就看有没有时间瞄准了…
就看有没有时间瞄准了…

weaponFeatureCN: 狂暴I：血量低于11时，攻击后判定，若为5~6则造成的伤害+3
weaponFeatureEN: Rage I: Jugde when attacking & HP≤10: 5~6 - Damage caused +3

weaponExplanationEN: Don't forget to plant them back!

weaponFeatureCN:
金装备：允许特殊判定;
狂暴I：血量低于11时，攻击后判定，若为5~6则造成的伤害+3
weaponFeatureEN:
Golden: Allow some special judgements;
Rage I: Jugde when attacking & HP≤10 : 5~6 - Damage caused +3

weaponFeatureCN: 预装填：战斗中第一次使用不消耗回合，但第二次使用前需要消耗一回合填装
weaponFeatureEN: Preloading: See the first attack in the battle as quick acting, but need to spend 1 turn reloading for the next one
weaponExplanationCN: 你可能没有那个时间瞄准…
weaponExplanationEN: When there's no time for aiming…

weaponFeatureCN: 预装填：战斗中第一次使用不消耗回合，但第二次使用前需要消耗一回合填装
weaponFeatureEN: Preloading: See the first attack in the battle as quick acting, but need to spend 1 turn reloading for the next one

weaponFeatureCN: 火焰附着：穿透伤害，使对方战斗中每个回合结束时-3
weaponFeatureEN: Fire Aspect: -3 to your opponent when every round ends, penetrating damage

weaponFeatureCN: 钩索：对方在此次战斗中不可进行逃跑
weaponFeatureEN: Hooking: Your opponent cannot escape during this battle.

weaponFeatureCN:
允许双持；
格挡：抵消对方所有的物理、穿透伤害
weaponFeatureEN:
Can be equipped on both slots;
Blocking: Neutralize all physical and penetrating damage of the opponent.
